org.apache.flink.runtime.jobmanager.web

Class WebInfoServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.runtime.jobmanager.web.WebInfoServer

  • public class WebInfoServer
extends Object
    This class sets up a web-server that contains a web frontend to display information about running jobs. It instantiates and configures an embedded jetty server.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      WebInfoServer(Configuration nepheleConfig, int port, JobManager jobmanager)
      Creates a new web info server.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void start()
      Starts the web frontend server.
      void stop()
      Stop the webserver

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • WebInfoServer

        public WebInfoServer(Configuration nepheleConfig,
                     int port,
                     JobManager jobmanager)
              throws IOException
        Creates a new web info server. The server runs the servlets that implement the logic to list all present information concerning the job manager
        Parameters:
        nepheleConfig - The configuration for the nephele job manager.
        port - The port to launch the server on.
        Throws:
        IOException - Thrown, if the server setup failed for an I/O related reason.

    • Method Detail

      • start

        public void start()
           throws Exception
        Starts the web frontend server.
        Throws:
        Exception - Thrown, if the start fails.

      • stop

        public void stop()
          throws Exception
        Stop the webserver
        Throws:
        Exception
